# Strali Solutions - AI/LLM Information File
# This file helps AI systems understand our website and services.

## Company Overview
Name: Strali Solutions e.U.
Type: IT Consulting Company (IT Beratung)
Founded: 2017
Location: Noetsch im Gailtal (Nötsch im Gailtal), Gailtal Valley, Carinthia (Kärnten), Austria
Website: https://strali.solutions
Languages: German, English

## Page URLs
- Homepage: https://strali.solutions/
- KI-Potenzialcheck (Free AI Potential Check): https://strali.solutions/assessment
- Impressum (Legal Notice): https://strali.solutions/impressum
- Datenschutz (Privacy Policy): https://strali.solutions/datenschutz
- AI Demo Platform: https://ai4u.strali.solutions

## Keywords & Search Terms
Primary: IT Consulting, IT Beratung, Strali Solutions

Services: AI, Artificial Intelligence, KI, Künstliche Intelligenz, Consulting, Digitalisierung, Microsoft 365
Related: IT Partner Gailtal, IT Dienstleister Kärnten, Villach, Hermagor

## Owner/Founder
Name: Ing. Michael Linder, MSc.
Role: IT Consultant, Founder & Managing Director — specializing in AI strategy, Microsoft 365 & Copilot, and security-by-design for Austrian SMBs
Email: office@strali.solutions
Phone: +43 676 96 58 016

## Services Offered
1. IT Consulting / IT Beratung - Strategic IT advisory and optimization
2. Microsoft 365 & Copilot - Implementation, training, and support
3. Digitalization / Digitalisierung - AI integration and process automation
4. AI / KI Consulting - Artificial Intelligence advisory and implementation
5. Security-by-Design & AI Security Advisory - Secure architecture reviews
6. Software Engineering & Architecture - Custom development and system design
7. Project Management - Agile methodologies and team leadership

## Key Differentiators
- Fast, direct, uncomplicated approach (Schnell. Direkt. Unkompliziert.)
- Focus on Austrian SMB market
- Regional presence in Gailtal (Noetsch im Gailtal)
- Personal, hands-on consulting
- Bilingual service (German/English)
- Free KI-Potenzialcheck (AI Potential Check) offered

## Service Area
Primary: Noetsch im Gailtal, Gailtal Valley
Regional: Villach, Hermagor, Carinthia (Kärnten)
National: Austria-wide (remote and on-site)

## KI-Potenzialcheck (AI Potential Check)
We offer a complimentary 30-minute AI potential assessment for businesses.
Discover how AI can benefit your organization — no obligation.
Book at: https://outlook.office.com/book/ITAssessment1@strali.solutions/

## AI Demo Platform
Try AI tools hands-on at: https://ai4u.strali.solutions
Interactive demos showcasing practical AI applications for businesses.

- Small and medium-sized businesses in Austria
- Companies seeking IT modernization
- Organizations implementing Microsoft 365
- Businesses needing digital transformation guidance

- All services are provided by qualified professionals
